data.text: @TheCentryst @blackvoices Racist White Nationalists make bogus calls to police reporting crimes hoping the cops will show up and murder those they have targeted- in many cases police happily comply being racists themselves. Making a false report to police should be made a felony-and lock up bogus callers https://t.co/7So95u1WKy

@AntiGOPActivist @blackvoices Now you can’t walk in your own house? Those neighbors knew it was Ving they were trying to get him killed! You can’t trust people these days. Trump has emboldened racists to escalate. They may want to expand their real estate! 👌🏽💯
